title: 02/25/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 02/25/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin discusses the disconnect between Russell Wilson and the Seahawks organization and why Seattle needs to change course and make their franchise star happy again. He also takes a look at the free agency market of remaining quarterbacks and why it's bad news for the Patriots. Colin reacts to a report involving the 4 teams Russell Wilson would accept a trade to and which one would be the best landing spot. Former NFL Scout Daniel Jeremiah joins the show to do a LIVE Mock Draft with Colin covering the first 16 picks.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
